channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 09:15 Flow to the Khmelnytsky region. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 09:15 Flow to the Khmelnytsky region. Watch for further messages.#Khmelnitskaya This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 08:39 Dumping anxiety in the Kiev region. Stop by further messages.
item.description: 游릭 08:39 Dumping anxiety in the Kiev region. Stop by further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 08:20 Threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!

item.title: 游리 07:48 pm alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-mirorskaya territorial community-Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 07:48 pm alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-mirorskaya territorial community-Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
